Token.Abstract: * description: A vector series. If the type option is not specified, it is inherited from chart.type. For options that apply to multiple series, it is recommended to add them to the plotOptions.series options structure. To apply to all series of this specific type, apply it to plotOptions. vector.
* description: Maximum length of the arrows in the vector plot. The individual arrow length is computed between 0 and this value. * default: 20
* description: Maximum length of the arrows in the vector plot. The individual arrow length is computed between 0 and this value. * default: 20
* description: Maximum length of the arrows in the vector plot. The individual arrow length is computed between 0 and this value. * default: 20

* description: What part of the vector it should be rotated around. Can be one of start, center and end. When start, the vectors will start from the given [x, y] position, and when end the vectors will end in the [x, y] position.

* description: What part of the vector it should be rotated around. Can be one of start, center and end. When start, the vectors will start from the given [x, y] position, and when end the vectors will end in the [x, y] position.

* description: What part of the vector it should be rotated around. Can be one of start, center and end. When start, the vectors will start from the given [x, y] position, and when end the vectors will end in the [x, y] position.
